title: SportsBet • A Highly-Available Resilient Betting Solution
description: SportsBet is the foundation for a dynamic backend platform that integrates provider data and statistics, delivering a user-friendly experience while remaining competitive. It's built on .NET 7, employing Hexagonal/Onion architecture with microservices. It adheres to principles from Domain Driven Design, Clean Code, and CQRS, ensuring a robust and maintainable codebase. The solution features advanced technologies like AppMetrics, Autofac, and MediatR, and supports Docker and Kubernetes for containerization. It's designed to be resilient, highly available, and scalable, with plans to harness AI for personalized recommendations.

title: LikeableBackend • Backend Engine for the 3D Printing Community
description: LikeableBackend is a robust and efficient backend system for the Likeable concept-platform, a platform where 3D printing enthusiasts could share their creations, receive likes, favorites, and even place orders the creations of others. It was crafted using .NET 6 and a well-structured Hexagonal/Onion architecture with microservices at its core, leveraging key principles from Domain Driven Design, Clean Architecture, CQRS, SOLID and DRY, to ensure a maintainable and scalable codebase.

title: Flight Services • Frontend & Backend (Sunset)
description: An end-to-end flight booking and check-in system split across a frontend and backend. The frontend, FlightScanner, is an Angular-based web application allowing users to search for flights, make reservations, and complete the check-in process. The backend, FlightServices, is a Spring Boot application written in Java, which provides the API for the frontend. It interacts with databases, handles HTTP requests, and integrates with SendGrid for email notifications and AviationStack for flight data. The backend is fully dockerized, offering scalability and ease of deployment anywhere.

title: IoT Project • Diploma Thesis
description: IoT end-to-end system combining fall detection and measurement of various health characteristics using an open-source smart wearable (achieved with the implementation of sensor data algorithms and statistical analysis), transferring the data to a micro-controller (Raspberry pi) for processing ,recording in databases, taking action when needed, and displaying it in a user friendly way on a web-platform.

title: myBudget • Expense widget (Sunset)
description: Cross platform mobile app, for tracking daily expenses and giving budget suggestions based on them. Features expansive widget but also in-app functionality, like automations of fixed costs and incomes, savings tabs, custom expense categories and more.

title: Wordmania! • Λεξομανία!
description: A crossword game for android designed with extensibility in mind, by developing an algorithm to dynamically create levels based on a word dictionary input, meaning it can be extended in any language which uses an alphabetic writing system. Currently deployed in English (US) and Greek.
